title: Tasmanian adventure
brief_description: A tour of the scenic highlights of Tasmania, showing the variety of scenery, and the many sports available to the visitor. Shows beaches, rivers, rainforests, and rugged mountains where people can swim, sail, fish, surf and ski.
description: A tour of the scenic highlights of Tasmania, showing the variety of scenery, and the many sports available to the visitor. Shows beaches, rivers, rainforests, and rugged mountains where people can swim, sail, fish, surf and ski.
